name: Extreme Riding
description:
Extreme Riding is an exciting game where your task is to test your skills in driving different cars on exciting tracks! Choose your favorite car from the proposed ones and go to the track! Go through unusual obstacles, jump over cliffs, maneuver, and get to the finish line in a certain time! Pass all the tracks and show everyone that you are the best!

Game Features:
- Different difficulty levels
- Several cars
- Beautiful graphics
- Great soundtrack
